text: Juan Martín Jauregui (born in Mar de Plata, Argentina), is an Argentine actor, who currently resides in Mexico city, Mexico since 1999, known for participating in several telenovelas of Telemundo and TV Azteca. == Filmography == === Film roles === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
